tool_description: Project TEMPA - This API is capable of resolving Tesla's VIN Identifier, providing detailed information about Tesla vehicles based on their VIN.

api_list.name: VIN Detection
api_list.description: This endpoint resolves a Tesla VIN identifier to an actual VIN, providing information such as Manufacturer ID, Model Type, and more. The conversion has a success rate of approximately 98%.

required_parameters.name: vin-identifier
required_parameters.description: The VIN identifier to be resolved.

api_list.name: Manufacturing Location Detection
api_list.description: This endpoint resolves a VIN identifier to its manufacturing location, such as Fremont, Shanghai, Berlin, or Austin.

required_parameters.name: vin-identifier
required_parameters.description: The VIN identifier to be resolved.

api_list.name: Manufacturing Year Detection
api_list.description: Detects the manufacturing year of the respective vehicle based on the VIN identifier.

required_parameters.name: vin-identifier
required_parameters.description: The VIN identifier to be resolved.

api_list.name: Model Detection
api_list.description: This endpoint resolves a VIN identifier to a specific model type of the Tesla vehicle.

required_parameters.name: vin-identifier
required_parameters.description: The VIN identifier to be resolved.
